summary: in the spirit of Halloween I present to you my slenderman mod. It is my attempt to recreate the game \\\"slender.\\\"
descriptionHtml:
This is WIP, not finished yet. 

You must collect 8 pages, each time you do slenderman will spawn closer to you. Being next to slender man drains your health very fast, so if you see him run away. You only have a torch and a lantern to see (both work the same, but the player can choose which one they like) 

This mod is best used with visual mods that make skyrim darker. 

video of gameplay-http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SOcP0NxonL0&list=UUHAPfbp2ToeXaLgno01EpJQ&index=1&feature=plcp

Please visit my youtube channel for more upcoming videos and news on this mod. http://www.youtube.com/user/battlefield3media?feature=mhee
author: Benjamin543
